title: Linux getent Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the versatile getent command in Linux, learn how to retrieve user and group information, and discover practical examples to enhance your system administration skills.

meta.title: Linux getent Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the versatile getent command in Linux, learn how to retrieve user and group information, and discover practical examples to enhance your system administration skills.
meta.keywords: getent, Linux, user information, group information, system administration, utilities

verify.name: Verify getent command usage
verify.hint: The `getent` command usage information should display the expected format: "Usage: getent database [key ...]".

verify.name: Verify getent user information
verify.hint: The `getent passwd labex` command should display the expected user information for the 'labex' user.

verify.name: Verify getent group information
verify.hint: The `getent group labex` command should display the expected group information for the 'labex' group.
